hero.title: Discover
hero.description: The southern capital of Russia with rich history, delicious cuisine and hospitable residents. The perfect place to travel at any time of the year.

catherine.title: Monument to Catherine the Great
catherine.description: One of the symbols of the city, a restored historical monument in the center of Krasnodar.

theater.title: Theater Square
theater.description: The central square of the city with a singing fountain and beautiful architecture.

redStreet.title: Red Street
redStreet.description: The main pedestrian street of the city with many shops, cafes and historic buildings.

about.title: Why visit Krasnodar?
about.description: Krasnodar is a modern city with rich history that combines southern hospitality and dynamic development. Here you will find beautiful parks, interesting museums, delicious cuisine and many opportunities for recreation.

features.climate: Favorable climate with more than 200 sunny days a year

foodFestival.title: Kuban Cuisine Festival
foodFestival.description: Try traditional Kuban cuisine dishes from the best chefs in the region.

cityTour.title: Historical Center Tour
cityTour.description: Walking tour of the most interesting places in the old city.

museumNight.title: Museum Night in Krasnodar
museumNight.description: Special program with free museum visits until midnight.

newsletter.title: Be the first to know about new tours and events
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter and receive notifications about new excursions, special offers and cultural events in Krasnodar.

footer.description: Your guide to the best places in the southern capital of Russia.
